CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 8, 1957, pg. A9, reads: "It Was Fun - These happy young people were among the guests present at the 30th anniversary dance of the Girl Friends, Inc., at the Hotel Penn-Sheraton last Friday. They are, left to right, seated: Janet Douglass, Bernice VeLar, Donna Rideout, Patricia Prattis, and Yolanda Harris.  Standing: Charles Nickens, Roger Thomas, Joyce Robinson, Stanley Waters, Joe Bostic Jr., Sylvia Knott, Ronald Carter, Eugene Sharpe, Anita Kent, Nelson Harrison and Charlyene Kent. Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait seated from left: Janet Douglass, Bernice VeLar, Donna Rideout, Patricia Prattis, Yolanda Harris; standing: Charles or Garfield "Nicky" Nickens, Roger Thomas, Joyce Robinson, Stanley Waters, Joe Bostic Jr., Sylvia Knott, Ronald Carter, Eugene Sharpe, Anita Kent, Nelson Harrison, and Charlyene Kent, posed in Penn Sheraton Hotel for Girl Friends, Inc. 30th anniversary dance
